summary: A hip, well-dressed yuppie tracks down his biological parents, only to find that they live in a trailer park.
cast: Danny DeVito|Kathy Bates|Ron Livingston|Neve Campbell|Beverly D'Angelo|Bob Odenkirk|Edward Herrmann|Christine Baranski|Martin Mull|Michael McKean|M.C. Gainey|Star Jones|Ed Begley Jr.|Debbi Morgan|Pete Schwaba|Jimmy Pardo|Dierdre Holder|Rose Abdoo|Terry Cooley|Connie Sawyer|William Dennis Hurley|Tracey Walter|Jeffrey James Shoe|Christa Campbell|Sam Rubin|Anna Davidson|Mary Ruth Clarke|Robert Harvey|Joe Goddard|Kipleigh Brown|Dave Bautista|Wendy Braun|Jordan Brower|Jon Donahue|Sean Dorgan|Maryeve Dufault|Chad Greene|Priscilla Leona Horne|Stefan Kalinka|Kaidy Kuna|Paul Levesque|John O'Rourke|Emo Philips|Tom Poole|Matt Shea|Paul Tuminaro
title: Relative strangers: una familia casi perfecta
